title: Regal Diamond Cascade Set - A Modern Haaram & Jhumka Ensemble
materials: Crafted from 18K White and Rose Gold. Adorned with meticulously set Cubic Zirconia stones. Hyderabadi Polish provides a lasting luster.
features: This statement set features a unique cascade design, blending traditional Haaram elements with a modern aesthetic. The choker necklace is intricately crafted with alternating Rose and White gold tones in geometric shapes and floral motifs. The earrings mirror the necklace design with a cascading tiered structure.
colors: Dual-tone: A harmonious blend of Rose Gold and White Gold. The Cubic Zirconia stones add a brilliant sparkle.
occasions: and other festive celebrations where you want to make a bold and elegant statement.
description: A bold and contemporary design perfect for the modern woman. The cascading geometric design is visually striking, and the dual-tone gold adds depth and dimension. High-quality Cubic Zirconia ensures maximum sparkle and brilliance, offering the look of fine diamonds at an accessible price point. A versatile set that transitions seamlessly from grand celebrations to sophisticated evening events.
